verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou wast \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*: thy \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* saviour, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deal confidently, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H6342"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

\w You|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* \w out|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3444"\w* saviourâ€™s \w fountains|strong="H4599"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w Praise|strong="H3034"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* works \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H7682"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H2167"\w* ye \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* great \w things|strong="H3605"\w*: shew \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w forth|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="H7442"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*, O thou habitation \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Sion: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* thee, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
